Installing
----------

.. raw:: html

   <div class="col-md-9">

The latest stable release (and older versions) can be installed from ``PyPI``::

    pip install mdl-R33-analysis

Alternatively, you can install the development version directly from ``github``::

    pip install git+https://github.com/risoms/mdl-R33-analysis.git

Another option would be to to clone the `github repository
<https://github.com/risoms/mdl-R33-analysis>`_ and install from your local copy::

    pip install .

Dependencies
~~~~~~~~~~~~

-  Python 2.7 or 3.6+

-  `numpy <http://www.numpy.org/>`__

-  `scipy <https://www.scipy.org/>`__

-  `PIL <https://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/stable/index.html>`__

-  `matplotlib <https://matplotlib.org>`__

-  `pywin32 (if using Windows) <https://github.com/mhammond/pywin32>`__

-  `pyobjc (if using Mac OS) <https://pythonhosted.org/pyobjc/>`__

   </div>
